name: createRepoInvalidContentType

statusDetails.message:
Don't know how to encode {"name":"TestRepoName2023-07-2520-08-00"} as a byte stream.

Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type.
For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("application/text", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
